name: Le LÉGUME
description:
Le LÉGUME is a weird action Game. You're a doctor in a spécial hospital where you have to care about vegetable's health !

Vegetables have always taken care of our health... Now it's your turn to help them !

Music :

Jeremy Blake - Powerup

Kevin MacLeod - 8bit Dungeon Level

Created by Edartz and OhMyGuigui.
